Text:
a/v 10/10. Downloaded this and MP4 by Neon to compare. Couldn't see any differences. Decided to delete this one and go with the other to save space on HD.

This is still a great torrent. Just, to me, not worth the extra size for a movie I will watch from time to time. Enjoy.

Good. A/8 V/8.
